prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Printed list of the published writings of William James, Accession #6964-c, Clifton Waller Barrett Library of American Literature, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was deposited by Clifton Waller Barrett through the University of Virginia Library Rare Book Department on July 25, 1974, and changed to a gift on July 1, 1991.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: With holograph annotations and additions [by Henry James, 1879-1947].
